entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
